subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Goals by Didier Drogba and Frank Lampard kept Chelsea atop the Premier League with a 2-0 victory at Liverpool, and Manchester United made sure the title race would go to the last day with a 1-0 win at Sunderland on Nani’s first-half goal.
snippet: Goals by Didier Drogba and Frank Lampard kept Chelsea atop the Premier League with a 2-0 victory at Liverpool, and Manchester United made sure the title race would go to the last day with a 1-0 win at Sunderland on Nani’s first-half goal.
